mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_guest ( `guestname`, `sex`, `guestgrade`, `type`, `heartprice`, `phone`, `remarks`, `areas`, `huxing`, `position`, `purpose`, `label`, `iskey`, `record_user_name`, `create_user_name`, `create_time`, record_time, huxingshi, huxingting, huxingwei, huxingchu, record_rel_name, create_rel_name, phonetow ) VALUES ( #{guestname}, #{sex}, #{guestgrade}, #{type}, #{heartprice}, #{phone}, #{remarks}, #{areas}, #{huxing}, #{position}, #{purpose}, #{label}, 0, #{recordUserName}, #{createUserName}, NOW(), NOW(), #{huxingshi}, #{huxingting}, #{huxingwei}, #{huxingchu}, (SELECT relname FROM sys_user WHERE username=#{recordUserName}), (SELECT relname FROM sys_user WHERE username=#{createUserName}), #{phonetow} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_guest SET record_time=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT `id`, `number`, `guestname`, remarks, record_user_name, record_rel_name, record_time, create_time FROM bus_guest WHERE iskey!=1 AND record_user_name=#{username}
AND guestname like "%"#{searchText}"%" OR number like "%"#{searchText}"%"

SELECT bg.id,su.`username` record_user_name, (CASE WHEN TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(bg.record_time)>=10 AND TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(bg.record_time) <15 THEN '1' WHEN TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(bg.record_time)>=15 THEN '2' END) casetype FROM `bus_guest` bg LEFT JOIN `sys_user` su ON su.`username`=bg.`record_user_name` WHERE (TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(bg.record_time)) >= 10 AND bg.isshare = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_guest SET record_user_name=NULL, record_rel_name=NULL, isshare=1 WHERE id=#{id}
